title: Conduct Student Interviews

title: Define Adaptive Engine Rules

title: Break Subjects into Micro-Modules

title: Design Initial UI Wireframes
description: Prepare wireframes for dashboard, quiz flow, and progress tracking.

title: Validate Market Need
description: Summarize student problems and show demand for personalization with real interview data.

title: Competitive Gap Analysis
